summary: Contemporary R&B, or simply R&B, is a popular music genre that blends rhythm and blues with pop, soul, funk, hip hop, and electronic music. It has a smooth, rich sound with stylish vocal arrangements and often uses melisma, where singers slide between notes. This genre often uses hip-hop beats but makes them smoother. Since the 1980s, R&B has mixed elements of hip-hop culture, pop culture, and pop music, creating a unique and catchy sound.
title: Contemporary R&B
